description: The maximum rms of the astrometric distance distribution for stellar pairs with separations of D=5 arcmin (repeatability) (milliarcsec).
The maximum rms of the astrometric distance distribution for stellar pairs with separations of D=20 arcmin (repeatability) (milliarcsec).\n
The maximum rms of the unresolved source magnitude distribution around the mean value (repeatability).
At most PF1 % of magnitudes may deviate by more than this from the mean (millimag).
